description: This Maruti Suzuki Estilo Zen Estilo  2013is a steal at just Rs.1850000. It has 86000km on the clock and comes with a Manual transmission system as well as other great features. You will be hard pressed to find better value for your money elsewhere. Don’t forget to mention Carmudi when you contact the seller!
name: Maruti Suzuki Estilo Zen 2012
